Sentencas: A three-dimension (3D) kinetic Monte Carlo (kMC) model is developed to study the sintering kinetics and microstructure evolution of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) composite electrodes during the co-sintering processes.
Titulo: Simulation of sintering kinetics and microstructure evolution of composite solid oxide fuel cells electrodes

Sentencas: The model employs Lanthanum Strontium Manganite (LSM) - Yttria-stabilized Zirconia (YSZ) composites as the example electrodes but can be applied to other materials.
Titulo: Simulation of sintering kinetics and microstructure evolution of composite solid oxide fuel cells electrodes

Sentencas: The sintering mechanisms include surface diffusion, grain boundary migration, vacancy creation, and annihilation.
Titulo: Simulation of sintering kinetics and microstructure evolution of composite solid oxide fuel cells electrodes

Sentencas: A morphological dilation method is used to generate the initial LSM-YSZ compacts as the input structures for the kMC simulation.
Titulo: Simulation of sintering kinetics and microstructure evolution of composite solid oxide fuel cells electrodes

Sentencas: The three-phase boundary (TPB) length, porosity, and tortuosity factor of the composite cathodes are calculated during kMC sintering.
Titulo: Simulation of sintering kinetics and microstructure evolution of composite solid oxide fuel cells electrodes

Sentencas: Simulation results are compared with literature data and good agreement is found.
Titulo: Simulation of sintering kinetics and microstructure evolution of composite solid oxide fuel cells electrodes

Sentencas: Parametric study is conducted to investigate the effects of particle size, size distribution, and sintering temperature on sintering kinetics as well as the evolution of electrode microstructures.
Titulo: Simulation of sintering kinetics and microstructure evolution of composite solid oxide fuel cells electrodes

Sentencas: The kMC model is capable of simulating the initial and a part of intermediate sintering stages of SOFC electrodes by considering various sintering mechanisms simultaneously.
Titulo: Simulation of sintering kinetics and microstructure evolution of composite solid oxide fuel cells electrodes

Sentencas: It can serve as a useful tool to design and optimize the sintering processes for composite SOFC electrodes.
Titulo: Simulation of sintering kinetics and microstructure evolution of composite solid oxide fuel cells electrodes
